source_text: SHOCKING TRUTH: Doctors don't want you to know about this miracle cure that absolutely guarantees weight loss in just 7 days!
TruthTell is an advanced AI-powered system designed to detect and analyze potential misinformation in real-time during live broadcasts and digital content streams.
The system employs cutting-edge natural language processing, machine learning, and fact-checking integration to provide immediate insights and alerts about potentially misleading content.
